#summary One-sentence summary of this page.

== 杜绝变量悬空现象 ==

    不要出现:
{{{
    if (!window.Element){
        var Element = new Object();
    }
}}}
    因为,这等价于:
}}}
    var Element = undefined;
    if (!window.Element){
        Element = new Object();
    }
}}}
    改成：
{{{
    var Element = window.Element || {};
}}}

    或者：
{{{
    var Element = window.Element ;
    if(!Element){
      Element = new Object();
    }
}}}
